meanings.definition: A large, herbivorous lizard native to the southwestern United States and northern Mexico.
meanings.sent1: The chuckawalla basked in the sun on the rocky desert.
meanings.sent2: I saw a chuckawalla scurrying across the sand in the desert.
meanings.sent3: The chuckawalla tried on sunglasses to look cool in the desert.
meanings.sent4: The chuckawalla was a colorful painting on the canvas of the desert.
meanings.sent5: The chuckawalla's spiky skin protected it from predators in the desert.

meanings.definition: To throw or toss something carelessly or casually.
meanings.sent1: He decided to chuckawalla the ball to his friend during the game.
meanings.sent2: She chuckawallaed the paper into the recycling bin.
meanings.sent3: The kids played a game of chuckawalla with water balloons.
meanings.sent4: The wind chuckawallaed the leaves across the yard.
meanings.sent5: She chuckawallaed her clothes into the suitcase before the trip.
